officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Canrenone as Add-on in Patients With Essential Hypertension-Italy (ESCAPE-IT)
inclusionCriteria:
* Caucasian patients affected by uncomplicated, essential hypertension, not well controlled by concomitant administration of ACE-I or ARBs and diuretics at the maximum dosage.
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 80 Years
